rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible entrance with ramp leading into the central courtyard.
Open plan space adjacent to the kitchen. Designed for wheelchair accessibility and Vastu compliant south-east orientation.
Modern open-plan kitchen integrated with dining area, designed with wide doorways.
Largest bedroom on ground floor ensuring ease of access for wheelchair users. Windows oriented per Vastu guidelines (south-east).
Guest bedroom with direct access to the central courtyard.
Open space adjacent to living area, providing outdoor seating and easy wheelchair navigation.

additional_features.description: Open courtyard area designed for natural light and ventilation, aligning with Vastu principles.
Wheelchair accessible pool area with ramp access.
